alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Humboldt; Kossuth; Winnebago; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 6:16PM CDT until April 23 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Wright County in north central Iowa... Eastern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Hancock County in north central Iowa... Eastern Humboldt County in north central Iowa... Winnebago County in north central Iowa... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wells to 7 miles northwest of Eagle Grove, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forest City, Garner, Lake Mills, Britt, Eagle Lake, Rice Lake, Buffalo Center, Kanawha, Klemme, Thompson, Titonka, Wesley, Corwith, Leland, Lu Verne, Crystal Lake, Renwick, Woden, Rake and Goodell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
